title: Rivet a Wing Skin
description: An automated riveting machine must install thousands of rivets to attach the skin to the underlying wing structure.

tasks.description: Load the correct riveting program for the specific wing panel into the machine.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent loads the correct NC program.

tasks.description: Operate the machine to drill the holes and install the rivets.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent oversees the automated riveting process.

tasks.description: Perform a quality inspection to ensure all rivets are properly installed and have no defects.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent inspects the rivets and confirms they all meet quality standards.
